title: [Self-Directed] Climate Science Understanding Course Using 3D Interactive Games

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental earth science and physics knowledge (middle school level)
context.additional_context: Climate science competency enhancement program through smartphone-based 3D game learning

learning_goals: One can explain the interaction principles of the solar system and Earth system via 3D simulation
One can analyze the impact of radiative energy balance and albedo effects on climate using in-game experimental data
One can visualize and explain the molecular characteristics of greenhouse gases and warming mechanisms through 3D modeling
One can apply scientific approaches for climate change mitigation through game quests with over 85% proficiency

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
